about_the_game:
"Yubu: The Shoeventure" is a 3D platformer with a twist - It let's you build your own playstyle with equipable movesets!



Yubu, a brave young Footarian, embarks on a mission to dismantle the Reseller's dominion over the Maibli Isles, using an unexpected weapon: shoes!

In this epic quest, your mission is clear aid Yubu in his battle against the Reseller, a foe seeking to disrupt harmony in the shoeless society of Footaria. With your help, Yubu will navigate challenging platforms, uncover hidden secrets, and unleash his extraordinary shoe-based abilities.





Make Yubu's journey your own with customizable movesets and special moves. Equip different shoe enhancements to alter his abilities. Whether you prefer enhancing agility, boosting jumping power, or a balanced approach, the choice is in your hands. Mix and match these abilities to overcome obstacles and enemies in creative ways.

With each decision, Yubu's skills adapt to your playstyle, making every run through the game unique. Your strategy will determine the outcome of each challenge.





Special Moves for Special Moments
Boost Yubu's agility and power with special move shoe parts. Propel upwards with a burst of water, soar through the skies, or perform high-speed slides into enhanced jumps.

Control the way your shoe hit
Discover shoe parts that do more than complement footwear. Some parts scattered around Maibli Isles can cause explosions upon impact, trap enemies in ice, or release devastating lightning strikes.

Tactical Throwing Mechanics
Master the art of the throw with shoe parts that offer unique throwing patterns. Whether targeting the nearest enemy, a circle pattern, or bouncing off enemies.

Innovative Movement Options
Personalize Yubu with different shoe parts that affect Yubu's basic movements!

Customize your shoe, combine four different attributes and find what suits you!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Big Sur
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Big Sur
  • Processor: Apple M2
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

movies.name: Yubu: The Shoeventure | Extended Gameplay Trailer

name: Yubu: The Shoeventure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit) or Newer (64 bit) Windows OS
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760, AMD Radeon R7 270X, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit) or Newer (64 bit) Windows OS
  • Processor: 3.0+ GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 470, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller Recommended

short_description: "Yubu: The Shoeventure" is a 3D platformer with a twist - It let's you build your own playstyle with equipable movesets!
